org.relationlearn.filters

Class WordOcurrenceFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.relationlearn.filters.WordOcurrenceFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TextFilter

    public class WordOcurrenceFilter
extends Object
implements TextFilter
    An implementation of TextFilter which returns the ratio of words that have been found of the total amount of words specified in a given word list.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WordOcurrenceFilter(String name, List<String> words)
      Constructs a WordOcurrenceFilter with the Attribute name set to name and using the list of words found in words as word list.
      WordOcurrenceFilter(String name, String path)
      Constructs a WordOcurrenceFilter with the Attribute name set to name and using the serialized list of words found in path as word list.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double filter(String r, String h)
      Filters the corresponding pair of String values and returns its value in the weka internal floating-point format.
      Attribute getMappedAttribute()
      Returns the Attribute that this filter provides a value for.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        Parameters:
        name - the name this TextFilter Attribute will have
        words - the list of words to use

      • filter

        public double filter(String r,
            String h)
        Description copied from interface: TextFilter
        Filters the corresponding pair of String values and returns its value in the weka internal floating-point format.

        The method return type is able to support all types of Attribute that exist, with a single method for all possible TextFilter implementations.

        Specified by:
        filter in interface TextFilter
        Parameters:
        r - Response text in the argumentation
        h - Hypothesis text in the argumentation
        Returns:
        the value of this filter Attribute in weka internal floating-point format
        See Also:
        Instance.setValue(Attribute,double)
